Mary Makhatho               (10 Ọgọst 1965 - 7 Ọgọst 2017) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ telivishọn ya na Yizo Yizo, Gaz'lam, Generations na Ga Re Dumele
Amụrụ Makhatho n'abali iri nke ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 1965 na Soshanguve, South Africa
N'abali isii nke ọnwa Julaị 2017, o merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu mgbe ọ dachara
Ọ kụrụ isi n'oge ọdịda ma nọrọ na coma
Mgbe ahụ, e bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Johannesburg
Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, a kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Pretoria ma tinye ya na nlekọta dị elu n'abali iri nke ọnwa Julaị
Agbanyeghị, ọ nwụrụ n'abali asaa nke ọnwa ọgọstụ 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na otu na-enwetaghachighị mmụọ
E liri ya na ili ozu Block VV na Soshanguve na 14 August 2017
N'afọ 1998, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri SABC2 Kelebone
Na 2000, o sonyeere SABC1 serial ụmụaka bu Soul Buddyz, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka "Beauty"
N'afọ 2002, ọ pụtara na usoro abụọ: Yizo Yizo na Gaz'lam nke ọ weere obere ọrụ
Mgbe ahụ ọ pụtara n'akụkụ ụfọdụ dị ka "Puleng" nke SABC1 soap opera Generations
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Canadian CBC serial Jozi-H na ọrụ "Dumisani's First Wife"
Na 2008, o sonye na e.tv soap opera Rhythm City maka ọrụ "Connie"
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gachara, ọ lara ezumike nká na ihe nkiri ahụ, mana ọ sonyehachi na ihe nkiri ahụ na 2014
N'afọ 2010, ọ pụtara na e.tv ihe nkiri serial eKasi: Akụkọ anyị na ọrụ nke "Nelly"
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere SABC2 sitcom Ga Re Dumele ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke "Esther Mamoruti Tlhong"
Ihe ngosi ahụ  wuru ewu nke ukwuu ebe ọ gara n'ihu n'egosipụta agwa  nke agba ise ruo 2016
Na 2015, o sonyeere na SABC2 drama serial Mamello ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka "Mosumbuka"
Na 2015, o mere ihe nkiri n'ihe nkiri Hollywood blockbuster Duma nke Carroll Ballard duziri
Na fim ahụ, ọ na-egosipụta àgwà nkatọ dị ka "Thandi"
